thread.title: PM hails police, security forces for successful operation against terrorists in Bannu
thread.title_full: PM hails police, security forces for successful operation against terrorists in Bannu

author: @appcsocialmedia
title: PM hails police, security forces for successful operation against terrorists in Bannu
text: ISLAMABAD, Jan 29 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday lauded the police and security forces for conducting a successful operation against militants in Bannu, neutralizing three terrorists and thwarting their subversive designs. The prime minister paid tribute to the timely and coordinated action by the police and security forces, and underlined that their joint operation prevented a potential threat and safeguarded lives, a Prime Minister’s Office news release said. The prime minister said that with the support of the nation decisive action was underway to completely eliminate terrorists belonging to Fitna al-Khawarij. He reaffirmed the government’s firm resolve to eradicate terrorism from the country. Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif commended the professionalism, courage, and vigilance of the police and security personnel, and reiterated that the Government of Pakistan remained fully committed to ensuring lasting peace and security across the country.
summary: ISLAMABAD, Jan 29 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday lauded the police and security forces for conducting a successful operation against militants in Bannu, neutralizing three terrorists and thwarting their subversive designs. The prime minister paid tribute to the timely and coordinated action by the police and security forces, and underlined that their joint operation prevented a potential threat and safeguarded lives, a Prime Minister’s Office news release said. The prime minister said that with the support of the nation decisive action was underway to completely eliminate terrorists belonging to Fitna al-Khawarij.
